title: Personalized Game-Based Learning Course for Strengthening Scientific Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific concepts and experimental methodologies
context.additional_context: Customized science education course for working professionals, implementing VR-based experimental simulations applicable to job tasks

learning_goals: Learners can perform experimental procedures with over 85% accuracy in VR-based science simulation games
Learners can revise and supplement science concepts aligned with their cognitive level three or more times through in-game feedback systems
Learners can design two or more personalized learning pathways using adaptive game mechanisms (e.g., difficulty adjustment, content recommendations)

resources: VR Headset and Motion Tracking Equipment

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
